content.webTitle: Pick of the Week: London: Rock and Pop

fields.headline: Pick of the Week: Rock and Pop
fields.bodyText: Bob Dylan O2 Arena, SE10, Saturday 25 Apr; Roundhouse, NW1, Sunday 26th The Never Ending Tour continues. A new album Together Through Life sees Bob return with accordion-led tales of keeping it together in dark times. Yeah Yeah Yeahs O2 Shepherd's Bush Empire, W12, Saturday, Sunday 25-26 Apr Karen O leads the trio in their brave new "keyboards" direction. New album It's Blitz conﬁrms the wisdom of the move. Amadou & Mariam The Jazz Cafe, NW1, Sunday 26 Apr The Malian pair bring their sweet but never cloying take on African guitar pop. Girls Aloud O2 Arena, SE10, Sunday 26 Apr Band increasingly known as "Cheryl Cole and the other ones" celebrate their continued stay in the pop person's aﬀections. New album Out Of Control oﬀers more feisty confections. The Juan Maclean Madame JoJo's, W1, Tuesday 28 Apr DFA massive! John Maclean and sometime LCD Soundsystem member Nancy Whang continue their ﬁne campaign of stout electropop.
